items.question: How do I track my order?
items.answer: Check your shipping confirmation email for the tracking link. If you cannot find it, contact support with your order number and checkout email.

items.question: Do you offer ground coffee?
items.answer: Many products support whole bean and ground options. Tell me the product name and I will confirm the options.

items.question: Can I change subscription frequency?
items.answer: You can change subscription frequency in your account portal. If you cannot access it, support can help.

items.question: What is a good gift for a coffee lover?
items.answer: Coffee Explorer Box works well for first-time gifts. Coffee and Chocolate Pairing Box works well for premium gifts.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: Returns depend on product condition. Contact support for damaged or incorrect items.
